duties_responsibilities.duty: Cast, train and develop all Aquatics Team Members
Manage the financials of the Aquatics business to meet or exceed department goals
Ensure Aquatics Team Members offer a safe and friendly experience for our members and guests
Respond to all member inquires in a professional way

education_certification.credential: Some College experience, National Swimming Pool Foundation (NSPF) Certified Pool Operator, Red Cross Lifeguard Certified
